item.title: Published Work

item.description:
Major Publications

  • The Huffington Post - Technology, lifestyle, and culture articles
  • MakeUseOf - Tech tutorials, guides, and product reviews
  • The Nerd Stash - Gaming, entertainment, and pop culture content

Literary & Opinion Work

  • Substack - Personal essays and commentary
  • Fat Nugs Magazine - Opinion piece on Pride Month
